featured.text: They have found that certain parts of the brain are responsible for learning, memory, and language.

other.text: Recent studies indicate that the two halves of the brain—the right hemisphere and the left hemisphere — play extremely important roles in learning and communicating.
The researchers found that the parts of the brain involved in learning, memory, emotion, and touch became more active as the volunteers expected higher levels of pain.
